basics.label: Senior Accountant
basics.summary: Capable Accountant successful at managing multiple projects and consistently meeting deadlines under pressure. Extensive knowledge of accounting software and processes.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Accounting roles at various levels. Employed critical thinking skills to examine issues and develop best practice solutions. Currently working towards becoming a CPA.
highlights: Prepared financial statements for different projects on monthly, quarterly basis
Directly responsible for coordinating and managing payroll for over 50 employees on bi-weekly basis including resolving problems and issues with the payroll manager ADP.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Budget forecasting and preparation, journal entries related to prepaid expenses, adjustments, accruals and inter-company transactions.
highlights: Reconciliation of inventory, supplies, payroll and cash
Preparation and reconciliation of monthly financial statements

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Maintained full accounting records for service, wholesale, and retail industries. Computed taxes and ensured compliance with tax requirements.
highlights: Handled responsibilities of analyzing month-end financial reports
Performed posting checks, tracking General Ledger accounts, posting Journal entries

education.institution: University of Texas at Dallas- Naveen Jindal School of Management
